programme.title: Bless This House
programme.desc: Jean's sister visits, but she is not included in Sid's pre-arranged plans - and he is not about to alter them. Comedy, starring Sid James

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Jack tackles what promises to be the most sensitive and unenviable investigation of his entire career - deciding whether a man with Down's syndrome is capable of committing murder. David Jason stars as the caustic copper, with Bruce Alexander and Matthew Marsh

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: A confrontation between hunt stewards and saboteurs leads to the suspicious death of a protester - and makes Jack wonder whether the thrill of the chase has given the horsey set a taste for human blood. Whodunit, starring David Jason as DI Frost, with Bruce Alexander, Sean Pertwee, Del Henney and Tat Whalley

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Al tries to raise some quick cash, and offers to sort out all Louisa's household and plumbing problems if she can pay him promptly. The teacher gets good news on the employment front, and Martin accidentally inflicts a minor wound on an elderly patient - who responds by walking out of the surgery and vowing never to return. Drama, starring Martin Clunes and Caroline Catz, with Phyllida Law and Benjamin Whitrow

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Plans for Robert's birthday party are under way, but Rose's surprise contribution to the event ruffles feathers above and below stairs. Mary faces dramatic repercussions when a new farming venture is launched on the Downton estate, while Edith receives more unwelcome news. Hugh Bonneville, Lily James, Michelle Dockery and Laura Carmichael star in the costume drama

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Cora's playboy brother Harold has got himself into a spot of bother and Robert has to make a trip to America to bail him out. Blake and Mary are forced to put aside their differences to deal with the new farming venture on the estate, and help comes from an unlikely quarter when Violet is taken ill. Meanwhile, Mrs Hughes, Mrs Patmore and Carson try to keep the peace when romantic tensions cause disagreements downstairs. Hugh Bonneville, Julian Ovenden, Michelle Dockery and Maggie Smith star in the costume drama

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Rosamund comes up with a plan to help Edith out of her predicament, but will Violet see straight through it? Rose is frustrated when things don't go her way and Alfred realises too late he may have made a mistake. Anna is concerned by unexpected news just as she and Bates seem to be getting over the worst, Isobel finds herself the object of someone's attention and Mary asks Gillingham for a favour

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: It's summer and as part of Rose's debutante 'coming out' she is to be presented at Buckingham Palace. The family is in London, preparing Grantham House for the busy social programme, and Martha Levinson, not one to miss such a grand occasion, arrives from New York with Cora's recently disgraced brother Harold (Sideways star Paul Giamatti). Both outspoken and larger than life, they make quite an impression on certain members of high society. Meanwhile, when the Crawleys are implicated in a scandal that threatens to engulf the monarchy, Robert goes to great lengths to protect the royal family - and his own. Costume drama, starring Lily James, Shirley MacLaine, Hugh Bonneville, Maggie Smith, Laura Carmichael and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: While Britain feels the winds of change swept in by a new Labour government in 1924, Downton's residents - both above and below stairs - are undergoing alterations too. After mourning the death of his beloved wife Lady Sybil for four years, Branson decides it's time he got on with his life, although Robert isn't comfortable about the ex-chauffeur's relationship with local teacher Sarah Bunting. Mary is also ready for love again - but which of her beaus is her Mr Right? Meanwhile, Edith struggles to cope with being parted from her baby, Jimmy receives unwanted female attention and plans for a war memorial cause tension

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detectives investigate two murders in which the victims have been placed in water and surrounded by flowers. Vera and sidekick Joe believe the culprit may be linked to a group of bird-watching friends, but despite their increasingly tangled and dysfunctional relationships, the twitchers seem determined to protect one another. The very first episode of the drama adapted from Ann Cleeves' novel Hidden Depths, starring Brenda Blethyn, David Leon, Gina McKee, Wunmi Mosaku, Paul Ritter and Neil Armstrong

programme.title: Inside the Ritz Hotel
programme.desc: Documentary offering a behind the scenes look at life inside the Ritz Hotel in London, one of the most famous, traditional luxury hotels in the world. The programmes follows some of the famous faces that visit the hotels, including Richard E Grant, Anna Wintour and Mo Salah, and the work of hotel staff as they prepare for their famous afternoon tea. With consumers spending less and ever more luxury hotels opening their doors, how does one of the most well-known hotels in the world stand out from the rest?

programme.title: Inside the Ritz Hotel
programme.desc: Executive chef John Williams prepares to launch the first-ever cookbook that reveals The Ritz's most famous recipes. Penny Lancaster pops in for cocktails, and head concierge Michael De Cozar is celebrated for his 46 years of service

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: A dark family secret comes to light when a female hit-and-run suspect claims the woman she deliberately ran over on a pedestrian crossing was a ghost. However, the facts of the case tell a different story. Gwen Taylor guest stars, with Jack Shepherd

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: The discovery of a local landowner's body throws suspicion on two of his tenants, a couple who have previously been threatened with violence for refusing to move out of their cottage. Rather than stay and face the music they disappear, and Wycliffe realises if he does not get to them before the victim's family, the consequences could be deadly. Drama, starring Jack Shepherd and Jimmy Yuill

programme.title: Ladies of Letters
programme.desc: Vera and Irene make themselves at home on the prison ship, but a tattoo around Vera's navel leads to blood poisoning and Irene is shocked to learn her granddaughter has been told her granny is dead. Comedy, based on the books and radio series by Carole Hayman and Lou Wakefield, starring Maureen Lipman and Anne Reid

programme.title: Ladies of Letters
programme.desc: Vera campaigns to get Irene freed from the prison ship, aware that her pen pal is quite at home running a literacy programme and planning a production of Les Mis. The fundraiser goes well, though snooker player Les Spatchcock proves a poor substitute celebrity for Posh and Becks. Comedy, starring Maureen Lipman and Anne Reid

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: On the eve of an important dinner party, Mrs Bridges breaks down and steals a baby. Period drama, staring Angela Baddely and Gordon Jackson

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Janet comes face to face with the man who left her fighting for life just months earlier - serial killer Geoff Hastings, who has vowed to finally reveal the full extent of his crimes. Rachel and the rest of the team investigate the racially motivated murder of a taxi driver. On the personal front, Andy refuses to take no for an answer, so Janet threatens to report him to the DCI. Crime drama, starring Lesley Sharp and Suranne Jones, with an appearance by Kevin Doyle (Downton Abbey's Molesley)

programme.title: Never the Twain

programme.desc: A mysterious delivery causes Poirot to recall the time his supper at a Buenos Aires restaurant was rudely interrupted by the murder of a fellow diner, who unwittingly drank from a glass laced with cyanide. Drama, starring David Suchet and Philip Jackson

programme.desc: Mike uncovers a case of blackmail involving a newcomer to Aidensfield and Greengrass does a roaring trade in tinned meat until his customers discover what is in it. Rural drama, starring Jason Durr

programme.desc: Dev tries to kiss Geena during their romantic evening together, Shelley calls Peter while he is with Lucy, and Les and Kirk turn their house into a love-nest

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby is delighted that his heroes Hired Gun are reuniting to play at the Midsomer Rocks festival - minus their drummer, who disappeared 30 years ago after driving his car into a quarry. However, a string of bizarre warnings convinces the paranoid lead singer that someone is trying to stop the reunion, and his fears are confirmed when the backing singer drops dead on stage. Radio 2 host Suzi Quatro guest stars

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Robert has to make what could be a far-reaching decision about the recent bombshell. Rose, meanwhile, seems more concerned with persuading him to buy a wireless than what is happening to those around her - but then again, she's always been trapped in her own self-centred little world. In the kitchen, Mrs Patmore thinks she may have found a way to help Daisy cope with her studies, while Thomas' devious ways look set to scupper Baxter's friendship with Molesley. Finally, as Lord Merton continues to woo Isobel, Anna is reluctantly drawn into Mary's latest scheme

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a girl leads the police to uncover a secret obsession, while Greengrass takes on more than he can handle in the form of a furry house guest. Rural police drama, starring Jason Durr, Derek Fowlds and Bill Maynard

programme.title: McDonald & Dodds
programme.desc: A young woman dies in a busy park in broad daylight, so Dodds are called in to untangle the mysterious circumstances of her death. Who is she? How did she die surrounded by witnesses? And how is it possible that she appears to be smiling? Evidence leads to Professor George Gillan, a linguistic anthropologist who lives in a rambling mansion with his eccentric mother, whose 100th birthday is days away. Dodds is sure that the house has something to do with the murder, but in uncovering its history, Dodds also unearths secrets in his own past. Return of the crime drama, starring Jason Watkins and Tala Gouveia, with guest appearances by Alan Davies, Catherine Tyldesley and Sian Phillips

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: When an unpopular pub landlord is beaten to death, a police informant casts suspicion on his ex-wife and her new husband. It seems like an open-and-shut case - but Lane badly mishandles the entire investigation, forcing Wycliffe and Kersey to intervene. Jack Shepherd stars as the Cornish copper

programme.title: Wycliffe

programme.title: Smarty Pants

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. He asks the Scepter for the ability to smell good without washing. He's now giving off this delicious magnolia scent, but he's also starting to sweat shower gel profusely! Mo has to think fast and fix his problem before Maya sees what he's doing!

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Mo and Lenny are finally going to watch the movie they've been waiting for. But as they arrive at the cashier to buy their tickets, they are turned away because they are too young and can only come in with an adult. Impatient and outraged, Mo decides to ask for the power to age so he can accompany Lenny to see the movie. But with half-power, neither Mo, nor Sam age: everyone around them gets younger- mentally! They act like immature kids that are impossible to handle.

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam is convinced that her mother would be very disappointed if they didn't participate in the town's Familimbo together. But they are both stiffer than wooden planks! To avoid a guaranteed humiliation, Sam asks for the power of elasticity. Unfortunately for her, while her body does stretch and twist in impossible ways... it doesn't snap back to its initial shape. So off Sam goes on her crazy mollusc-like adventure to find Mo...

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes

The first episode explores how an often-absent mother and tough-loving father shaped Charles from a sensitive boy, as well as the breakdown of his marriage and affair with Camilla Parker-Bowles, which the media pored over in lurid detail

programme.title: Lyra

It will be covered from wall-to-wall in bespoke bookcases, with sustainable timber coloured to give it a rich, aged, antique appearance, and with another reading area to house more books - a cosy book nook on the landing. Graham installs the library's best kept secret - a hidden drinks cabinet

programme.title: Scared of the Dark

They are shackled into pairs for 12 hours, with one pair forced to spend an extra 12 hours trapped in a two metre square box

programme.title: Send Nudes: Body SOS

Both confront their life-size naked avatars to see how they could look with surgery. But will they decide to push ahead with their plans for surgery, or will their minds be changed by what they see in front of them and hear from our feedback panel?

programme.title: Celebrity Hunted

All in aid of Stand Up To Cancer

programme.desc: Another glimpse into the lives of expats who have left the UK for a new life in the Spanish sun. Cabaret star Mark - who appears on stage as Ruby Rox - films a video to play as part of his show, and sisters Vina and Nilam launch a business selling spice kits so expats can make their own curries. Tattoo artists Blane and Mark are in need of more customers, while retiree and metal detector enthusiast Stan spends his evenings searching the beaches for small change

programme.title: 5 News Update
programme.desc: The latest reports

programme.title: Motorway Cops: Catching Britain's Speeders

On the M6, PCs Matt Turner and Ian Cosgrove provide urgent back-up to a highways officer concerned about the strong smell of cannabis coming from a broken-down vehicle he stopped to assist

programme.title: 999: Critical Condition
programme.desc: When Duncan is admitted to Royal Stoke emergency department after falling down a full flight of stairs onto concrete, trauma team leader Richard Hall fears the worst. Elsewhere, a woman with a life-threatening brain tumour undergoes surgery to have it carefully removed, and a 21-year-old is treated after falling from a window and landing on metal railings

programme.title: A&E After Dark
programme.desc: The night staff at Hull Royal Infirmary battle to save the sight of 51-year-old Patricia, who tripped and impaled her eye on a tent peg. With her vision impaired, a CT scan reveals a bleed on the brain that requires the intervention of neurosurgeon Dr Kenneth. Plus, a patient is flown in by air ambulance after falling down a ditch in her mobility scooter

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers pursue a driver who flees the scene of a road accident in a decommissioned ambulance, eventually abandoning the vehicle on a railway line after crashing through level-crossing barriers. Elsewhere, Warren comes under attack from a gang of youths on a garage forecourt, Spenner nicks a runaway driver with the help of a wheelie bin, and Kev is faced with a flaming Mercedes in the middle of rush hour

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Documentary following life at Julian Norton and Peter Wright's veterinary practice as they and their team care for animals in the rural communities of North Yorkshire

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Documentary following life at Julian Norton and Peter Wright's veterinary practice as they and their team care for animals in the rural communities of North Yorkshire

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: This edition shows that being a traffic officer is not just about booking motorists as it follows North Yorkshire police handling cases of sex offences and people trafficking

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel heads to a restaurant for a job interview, only to find herself sitting at a table within earshot of her current boss. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler go house-hunting and Phoebe decides to change her name. Guest starring Paul Rudd and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice visits Essex to offer advice to a Colchester couple unable to snap up their dream home until they can sell their current house. Unfortunately, after four months on the market, there is still no buyer for the three-bedroom detached property - which comes complete with a wild colour scheme

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family enjoy a day out at the caves, with Grampy Rabbit as their tour guide

programme.title: Pip and Posy
programme.desc: The pair have fun making hats and pinkie promise one another they will wear them to the park, but Pip feels self-conscious

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Skye Kitty needs the pups' help to get down from an eagle's nest after retrieving one of Mayor Humdinger's socks

programme.title: Carry On Cabby (1963)
programme.desc: The neglected wife of a workaholic taxi owner grows increasingly tired of his lack of interest in their marriage. In a ploy to bring him to his senses, she secretly launches a rival cab firm with a driver roster made up of attractive women, who soon tempt his customers away. Comedy, starring Sid James, Hattie Jacques, Kenneth Connor and Charles Hawtrey

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events (2004)
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course (2016)
programme.desc: When Scrat causes a cosmic blunder that leaves Earth in the path of an asteroid, it's up to Sid the sloth and pals Manny and Diego to save the day. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, Denis Leary, John Leguizamo and Simon Pegg

programme.title: Jumanji (1995)
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising (2018)
programme.desc: Ten years after the Pan Pacific Defense Corps unleashed an army of Jaegers - 25-storey tall robots operated by mind-melded humans - former pilot Jake Pentecost is contacted by estranged sister Mako Mori. She implores him to return to the PPDC to head off the threat posed by Liwen Shao, chief executive of Shao Industries, who intends to replace the Jaegers with unmanned drones. Haunted by ghosts of the past, Jake eventually agrees to mentor a 15-year-old cadet called Amara, whose family were crushed to death during one monster attack. Director Steven S DeKnight's literally blockbusting sci-fi sequel, starring John Boyega, Scott Eastwood and Cailee Spaeny

programme.title: The Grey (2011)
programme.desc: Eight oil rig workers end up stranded in the middle of the Alaskan tundra when the plane flying them home crashes. With limited supplies, they must make a gruelling journey across the icy wilderness to civilisation, but their situation is made more perilous when a pack of ferocious wolves begins stalking them. Adventure, starring Liam Neeson, Frank Grillo and Dermot Mulroney

programme.title: Rose: A Love Story (2020)
programme.desc: Gripped by a violent and terrifying illness, a woman named Rose lives in seclusion with her husband Sam. As their loving relationship strains under the burden of Rose's illness, the arrival of a stranger shatters the fragile refuge they have built. Drama, starring Sophie Rundle and Matt Stokoe

programme.title: Border (2018)
programme.desc: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveller while aiding a police investigation that will call into question her entire existence. Crime drama, starring Eva Melander, Eero Milonoff and Jrgen Thorsson. In Swedish

programme.title: Mysterious Island (1961)
programme.desc: Soldiers escaping the American Civil War take flight in a giant observation balloon and land far away on a strange uncharted island, where they encounter giant creatures, cut-throat pirates, two shipwrecked Englishwomen - and the mysterious Captain Nemo. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Michael Craig, Herbert Lom, Joan Greenwood and Michael Callan, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen

programme.title: Shrek the Third (2007)
programme.desc: The bad-tempered ogre finds himself in the unwelcome position of being next in line for the throne. Preferring to stay at home in the swamps, he sets out on a quest to find the rightful heir - a rebellious teenager named Artie - and persuade him to face up to his responsibilities as the future king. Meanwhile, the ambitious Prince Charming sees his chance to take the throne. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Eddie Murphy, Antonio Banderas and Rupert Everett

programme.title: Mr Popper's Penguins (2011)
programme.desc: A workaholic businessman always puts his job before his family until he receives an unexpected inheritance from his explorer father - six penguins. He abandons his plan to offload the birds to a zoo when he finds his kids love them, and sets about turning his New York apartment into a suitable habitat. Family comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Carla Gugino and Angela Lansbury

programme.title: Galaxy Quest (1999)
programme.desc: The cast of a cancelled sci-fi series are reduced to a life of conventions and public appearances, only to find themselves genuinely transported into space. Naive aliens have mistaken the show for real life and want the actors to help defend them from an evil extraterrestrial warlord. Sci-fi comedy, starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Mortal Engines (2018)
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy. Fantasy adventure adapted from the Philip Reeve novel by The Lord of the Rings' Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens and Peter Jackson. Starring Hera Hilmar, Robert Sheehan and Hugo Weaving

programme.title: Peppermint (2018)
programme.desc: LA banker Riley sets out on a one-woman vengeance mission after her husband and daughter are killed on the order of a powerful drug lord and the criminals escape punishment, but events spiral out of control. Revenge thriller, starring Jennifer Garner, Jeff Hephner and Juan Pablo Raba

programme.title: Disobedience (2017)
programme.desc: A woman returns to a strict Jewish community after her father dies. She was forced to leave because she was in love with her female friend, but once reunited their passions are rekindled. Drama, starring Rachel Weisz, Rachel McAdams and Alessandro Nivola

programme.title: Disturbia (2007)
programme.desc: A troubled teenager is sentenced to three months under house arrest for attacking a teacher, and passes the time by spying on his neighbours. However, one day he notices something suspicious and becomes convinced one of them is a serial killer. Thriller, starring Shia LaBeouf, Carrie-Anne Moss, David Morse and Sarah Roemer

programme.title: Getting Personal
programme.desc: Presenter Deepa Shastri meets graduate Hamza Shaikh who is often mistaken for a child

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Dark Command (1940)
programme.desc: A teacher is defeated in his ambition to become the marshal of his town during the early years of the American Civil War, so he turns renegade instead. Before long he has a reputation as a feared raider fighting on the side of the South, and it falls to the newly appointed lawman whose job he coveted to stop his reign of terror. Western, starring John Wayne and Walter Pidgeon

programme.title: Attack! (1956)
programme.desc: An American infantry lieutenant fighting in German-occupied Belgium is convinced an inept but well-connected officer is not fit for command. When his unit are wiped out after another of the officer's mistakes, the lieutenant miraculously survives and returns to base seeking revenge. Second World War drama, starring Jack Palance, Eddie Albert, Lee Marvin, Buddy Ebsen and Robert Strauss

programme.title: Lonely Are the Brave (1962)
programme.desc: A rebellious modern-day cowboy breaks out of jail and escapes on horseback - but reckons without the relentlessness of the authorities, who give chase by car and helicopter. A dogged sheriff leads the pursuit, coming to sympathise with his quarry. Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Walter Matthau, Gena Rowlands and George Kennedy

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone (1958)
programme.desc: A drifter rides into a town dominated by the members of a ruthless family. He befriends a Mexican in jail for killing a man who attacked his sister and tries to save him from the gallows, getting caught up in the evil clan's running internal conflicts in the process. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Craig Stevens, Manuel Rojas and Barry Kelley

programme.title: Evolution (2001)
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: Knives Out (2019)
programme.desc: Wealthy crime novelist Harlan Thrombey invites his kin to an 85th birthday party at his mansion, but festivities are cut short by arguments. When the writer apparently commits suicide, Detective Lieutenant Elliott and Trooper Wagner attend the scene, while private detective Benoit Blanc hovers in the background, closely observing family members. Writer/director Rian Johnson's comedy crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Chris Evans and Ana de Armas

programme.title: The Ring (2002)
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinski's remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit (2014)
programme.desc: A former soldier injured in the line of duty takes up a new career as a financial analyst for the CIA. However, his deskbound position changes to a dangerous undercover assignment when he discovers a plot to destroy the US economy. Spy thriller inspired by Tom Clancy's novels, starring Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner and Kenneth Branagh, who also directed

In the first episode, 48 pairs are whittled down to just eight final teams through a series of challenges, and those eight must create a spectacular brick banquet, including an impressive chair that not only looks the part, but also strong enough for presenter Melvin Odoom

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil spends quality time with Haley and takes her on a tour of his old college. Meanwhile, Gloria and Jay are forced to talk about an intimate subject with Manny. American comedy, starring Ed O'Neill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The gang is quick to help a neighbour whose house has burnt down, but nothing quite works out the way it was intended. American comedy, starring Ed O'Neill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is upset to learn Penny is dating someone, so his friends encourage him to seek a new romance by asking another woman out. Sara Gilbert appears alongside her Rosen co-star Johnny Gale

programme.desc: Sheldon's grandmother, known as Meemaw, arrives in Pasadena to visit, but his excitement at her arrival quickly gives way to discomfort when she clashes with Amy. Comedy, guest starring June Squibb

Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

However, Bernadette is upset when Howard freaks out over her announcement as he becomes convinced that he needs to start earning more money. Comedy, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Peter Rabbit (2018)
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit has the run of a farm and its vegetable patch when the owner unexpectedly dies. When a relative inherits the property, he strives to rid his land of the rabbit and his woodland friends - but his feelings for a nature-loving woman complicate the battle of wits with the animal kingdom. Family comedy based on Beatrix Potter's stories, starring Domhnall Gleeson and Rose Byrne, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

Musical drama, starring Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron, Michelle Williams, Rebecca Ferguson and Zendaya

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: The love restaurant opens its doors once more. Party boy Danny from Essex wants to leave his fun-loving ways behind and find a special woman to settle down with. But when he sits down with straight-talking hairdresser Lauren, he might have had a little too much Dutch courage. High-heel wearing Paolo is back for a second shot at love, meeting fellow Italian Mario, while single mum Claire is hoping Jordanian-born care worker and fellow divorcee Fadi might be the soulmate she is looking for

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Bronte shares information that Harrison has wrongly supplied her with, leading Melinda to confront Harrison about his meddling in her relationship while Layton firmly has her back

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: After an epic retreat, the couples return to Sydney. The effects of the retreat are far-reaching: some couples have been torn apart and some made stronger by the trip away

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay is in New Jersey to help Rose Leone, who spent two years in a coma and came out of hospital to learn her son Michael had run her once-thriving Italian restaurant into the ground. With a menu of more than 126 dishes, the quality of the food is suffering, and even the chefs refuse to eat their own creations

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: First of a two-part special in which Gordon Ramsay heads to the Burger Kitchen in Los Angeles, where tensions are running high because owner Alan Saffron has spent his son's entire inheritance on the struggling restaurant. To make matters worse, the kitchen is run by a chef called David Blaine who shares nothing of his famous namesake's magic when it comes to cooking - and whose threatening behaviour regularly gets him into trouble

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Part two of two. The chef continues his quest to transform the fortunes of the Burger Kitchen in Los Angeles, where tensions were running high because owner Alan Saffron had spent his son's entire inheritance on the struggling restaurant. programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay visits family-run Luigi's in Orange County, California, where lazy shortcuts following the retirement of the owner's father have led the business to suffer. Ramsay faces the daunting task of reuniting a feuding family, before turning around the struggling restaurant, which currently has 126 dishes on the menu

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the 200th episode of the comedy, the gang finally celebrates Sheldon's birthday after more than nine years together, with the help of a few special guests. Starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with guest appearances from Adam West, Wil Wheaton and Stephen Hawking

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: On a weekend cabin trip with Penny and Amy, Sheldon spills one of Leonard's secrets, while Howard and Bernadette must draw a line when Raj goes overboard with pregnancy gifts. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon disagree over whether to continue holding their regular Roommate Agreement meetings, with Leonard suggesting they are no longer required, while Sheldon believes they are still essential. As the pair's squabble quickly escalates into a full-blown argument, the rest of their friends turn up for a planned Game of Thrones viewing party, and end up taking sides in the dispute - resulting in two warring factions taking up residence in 4A and 4B. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang goes to a bar and runs into Penny's old boyfriend Zack, while Bernadette is left to spend the evening with Sheldon when she cannot go wine tasting with the others. Elsewhere, things do not go to plan when Raj introduces his new girlfriend, Claire. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon discovers a surprise screening of The Avengers is scheduled at a local cinema, complete with a Q&A session with the film's director, Joss Whedon. However, the event just happens to clash with time he'd planned to spend with Amy, so he decides to pay Stuart to be his subtitute for the afternoon while he and the other boys immerse themselves in Marvel superheroics. Meanwhile, Leonard's mother Beverly arrives in town for an extended visit, and Penny takes the opportunity to bond with her new mother-in-law - and to make up for not inviting her to the wedding. Comedy, guest starring Christine Baranski

programme.title: Home Alone (1990)
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy

programme.title: The Martian (2015)
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last the crew a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, Strictly Come Dancing, The Secret Life of the Zoo, The Next Great Magician, Married at First Sight, The Festival of Remembrance, and the week's news. First aired in November 2016

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: An edition from November 2016, in which the householders direct their insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional attentions to The Grand Tour, The X Factor, Planet Earth II, Breaking the Silence Live, I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, Who Do You Think You Are? and the News. The programme captures their instant reactions and lively discussions from the comfort of their own homes

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson hosts a Pride special, celebrating all of the most memorable singletons from across the sexual spectrum. Plus, a chance to catch up with some of the unforgettable pickers, including 75-year-old bisexual Ian - the show's oldest ever picker, Raheem the professional dancer looking to 'pop his gay cherry', and transfeminine singleton Callie, who came on the show to find her first 'proper' date

programme.title: Below Deck: Mediterranean
programme.desc: After a night of letting loose, two crew members are forced to confront their complicated past, while another feels a bit worse for wear, forcing others to pick up the slack

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Donna-Marie goes on a trip down memory lane, Charlie goes in search of his biological father, and Romeo accuses his parents of leaking compromising photos of him and Rayne

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes and Felix decide to throw a surprise party for Warren, Scott shares some exciting news with Maxine, and Honour is pushed to her limits

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Leah comes up with a plan to help Darren persuade Charlie to return home. Meanwhile, the Chen-Williams children are taken aback when they hear some shocking news

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Rosaria bought Bella Luna to realise her son Gianfranco's ambition to become a chef, but the Italian restaurant's future looks bleak due to his lack of experience in the kitchen combined with her refusal to acknowledge the eatery's many flaws. Gordon Ramsay heads to Easton, Pennsylvania, to help the troubled pair and save the business from financial disaster

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he helped that were among the biggest challenges he faced, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he meets sisters Rita and Lisa to see if they have continued serving fresh instead of frozen food at Boston's La Galleria 33, before heading to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, to discover whether controlling owner Tom has kept his promise and handed over the reins to his daughter Andrea. Finally, Gordon goes back to the Prohibition gastro pub in Everett, Washington, to catch up with owner Rishi and learn if she has ditched belly-dancing in favour of running her business

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Following Erica and Geoff's break-up, Murray decides to take Erica out on a daddy-daughter date to cheer her up, and Adam is excited to participate in the school senior prank

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: With Geoffrey away on spring break, Lainey heads to Hollywood to see her best friend. Adam is invited to join the cool kids' poker night

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy try to eliminate stress from the planning of their wedding by applying mathematics to the process. Meanwhile, Raj 'breaks up' with Howard after realising that his best friend is actually damaging his confidence

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Howard plan respective birthday celebrations for Amy and Halley. A letter from his brother makes Leonard feel anxious about his own lack of accomplishments. The series takes a mid-season break until the new year.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Luke spend father-son time together searching for hidden treasures beneath the house, Mitch and Cam cause embarrassment by inviting Lily's paediatrician to lunch, and Haley takes her driving test

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil finds himself in an awkward situation when he meets his former high-school girlfriend, who confesses she still has feelings for him, while Mitchell stands up to his boss and Jay summons up the courage to confess he killed Manny's turtle

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The precinct gets a new detective who is coming away from a 12-year undercover assignment with the Mob. Boyle's latest mess lands everyone in trouble with the caretakers, and Gina directs a video about the precinct for Captain Holt. Jason Mantzoukas and Kate Flannery guest star

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Holt allows Santiago and Peralta to house-sit for him while he visits Kevin in Paris, but mayhem ensues when Holt's beloved dog, Cheddar, goes missing on their watch. A romantic fling between Adrian Pimento and Diaz disrupts life at the precinct, disgusting their co-workers

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends fight over a ring they believe was used in the Lord of the Rings film trilogy. Leonard hopes to return the item to its rightful owner - but Raj wishes to sell it so he can buy a jet ski, and Sheldon develops a Gollum-like obsession with the precious object

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is awarded a prestigious prize by the university, but is scared of collecting the gong at a ceremony because he knows he'll have to give a speech. Penny tries to gee him up with rousing references to X-Men, and Leonard and Raj offer psychological guidance - without much success

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A brilliant but reclusive scientist, Dr Wolcott, invites Sheldon to his cabin in the middle of nowhere, so Leonard, Raj and Howard go along for the trip. Penny and Bernadette improvise when Amy doesn't like the tame bachelorette party they have planned for her. Peter MacNicol guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon isn't pleased by the newfound popularity of Stuart's comic book shop when an author puts the place on the map. When Raj attempts to take the credit for Penny's astronomical discovery, friendships are tested. Howard and Bernadette try to arrange a date night

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire finds herself becoming an overbearing mother when she finds out that Alex has a crush on a boy, and Haley's idea of sisterly advice is not helping matters. Meanwhile, Mitchell and Cameron have an argument over the former's aversion to public displays of affection, and Gloria believes that her grandmother has been visiting in her dreams. Comedy, starring Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: An earthquake strikes, leaving Claire stuck in the bathroom with a plumber. Meanwhile, the tremor causes Manny to experience an existential crisis, and Mitchell struggles to remain calm. Comedy, guest starring Nathan Lane (The Producers)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: In a New Girl crossover episode, Peralta runs into Jess Day, who is visiting New York from Los Angeles, and enlists her help on his latest case. Holt looks for ways to improve the team's morale as they come to terms with being on the night shift, while Santiago is filled with curiosity when Diaz starts to take long breaks from her desk. Zooey Deschanel (New Girl) and Matt Walsh (Veep) guest star

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: On Halloween, the squad members follow precinct tradition and pull out all the stops as they compete for the title of Ultimate Detective Slash Genius in the Halloween Heist. Peralta, Santiago and Holt are the determined competitors - but who will be crowned the reigning champion?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Conflict arises when Leonard's newly divorced parents and Sheldon's devoutly religious mother are all in town at the same time. And when Howard and Raj are contacted about the guidance system they've developed, they assume that the government is out to get them. Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends struggle through an awkward morning after Sheldon's mother and Leonard's father share an evening together. Penny's family arrives in town to attend Penny and Leonard's second wedding ceremony. Keith Carradine, Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An embarrassing secret from Howard's past comes to light as he tries to win back Bernadette, while Sheldon and Raj engage in a battle of wills when they have to work in the same office. Guest starring Katee Sackhoff and George Takei

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is depressed that everyone seems to be paired off except him, and resorts to desperate measures to get a girlfriend. Meanwhile, Sheldon looks for a way out of his relationship with Amy, who wants him to meet her mother. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Warren goes back on his promise to Sienna, Donna-Marie wants someone to talk to, and James visits Eric in prison with his appeal strategy update

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: All eyes are on Bronte and Harrison, and Claire and Jesse at the penultimate Commitment Ceremony, while Alyssa and Duncan unexpectedly fall apart on the couch

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Sam confronts Joel over his treatment of Inga, while Ruby has a dilemma after Harvey goes on a promising first date with new girl in town Mel

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Britain's Got Talent, The Thief, His Wife and the Canoe, Romeo and Duet, Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof, The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up To Cancer, Roar, Stacey Dooley Sleeps Over, and Expedition Bigfoot

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson hosts a Pride special, celebrating all of the most memorable singletons from across the sexual spectrum. Plus, a chance to catch up with some of the unforgettable pickers, including 75-year-old bisexual Ian - the show's oldest ever picker, Raheem the professional dancer looking to 'pop his gay cherry', and transfeminine singleton Callie, who came on the show to find her first 'proper' date

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Liverpool lass Alex sits down for a meal with union rep Sam, and they immediately click over their political beliefs - but she isn't too sure when he reveals his musical preferences. Three-times divorcee Zina meets undertaker to the stars Chris, whose job has so far been the kiss of death. Can he convince her he is a catch? DJ Charli sets Scott her usual test for any potential partner - seeing how he reacts to her friend Pascal, who she always carries round with her - and 33-year-old mummy's boy Frank hopes confident gym beauty Nisha will see through his shyness

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: All eyes are on Bronte and Harrison, and Claire and Jesse at the penultimate Commitment Ceremony, while Alyssa and Duncan unexpectedly fall apart on the couch

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Sam confronts Joel over his treatment of Inga, while Ruby has a dilemma after Harvey goes on a promising first date with new girl in town Mel

programme.title: Below Deck: Mediterranean
programme.desc: The chef and chief stew have an icy stand-off, and the guests are disappointed when incoming weather forces the boat back to the marina

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon goes to Las Vegas and does everything he can to win a large sum of money for science. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette take Amy shopping for a wedding dress, but her terrible choice entangles them in a web of lies

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly encourages Principal Ball to establish a non-athlete senior night, while Erica's friends are not interested in being pre-wedding fun captain so she asks Geoff's sister

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly learns Linda Schwartz is hosting Thanksgiving and is concerned that her role is being threatened, while Pop-Pop surprises the family by showing up with a new lady friend

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Another selection of favourite investigations from the team. Jimmy Doherty hears about a threat to British juniper berries that could mark the end of gin's recent resurgence in popularity, while Kate Quilton delves into the contents of herbal bedtime teas to establish if they really can help people get to sleep more easily. Big oyster fan Matt Tebbutt wonders why he never finds pearls in his seafood platters so sets off for China, where he discovers that pearl production is full of surprises

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton is on the Portuguese island of Madeira, helping house-hunters Sandy and Phil find the perfect holiday home to enjoy with their children and grandchildren

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Peter and his mum Greta from Hull employ the skills of Jonnie Irwin to help find Peter his dream property in Huelva in Spain. The pressure is on as this will be a permanent relocation, so are any of the five properties Jonnie shows Peter perfect for his 150,000 budget?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Retired history teacher Colin has long-held a dream of owning a Spanish bolthole to enjoy regular getaways in the sunshine. Here, Ben Hillman finds five properties along the eastern Costa del Sol, which he hopes will be perfect for Colin's 100,000 budget. Colin's best friend Clive also comes to help with the hunt

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: A quartet of B&B owners battle it out to decide which of their establishments provides the best value for money, beginning with luxury weight-loss and detox retreat Slimmeria in East Sussex. The guests worry about uncomfortable sleeping arrangements, the price of accommodation and the strict 9pm curfew - and the prospect of a dance-style workout only exacerbates their bad mood

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Jan and William Cheeseman, owners of five-star Gold-rated 38 St Giles in Norwich, try to impress their competitors. Unfortunately, poor breakfast presentation and complaints about noise from the street increase the tension between the couple as they strive for perfection

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Ann and Bill Clay play host at their four-star Bosvean House B&B in Bude, Cornwall. Diane and Max Seivewright query the establishment's luxury description, while Galia Grainger complains about the lack of a sea view. However, the hosts hope an indulgent Cornish cream tea, a stick dance and a drink in their garden shed will succeed in winning over the guests

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Village bakers Diane and Max Seivewright, the owners of Ombersley B&B in Worcestershire, host the last round of the competition, but some guests are far from impressed with the rooms and food

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners gather to find out who has won the competition. Diane and Max Seivewright, the hosts at Ombersley B&B, feel betrayed by Ann and Bill Clay's feedback and want to know why they have been so harshly criticised, while Galia Grainger asks why Slimmeria's rules and regulations have provoked so much hostility

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Catching up with two sets of house-hunters with different requirements. In 2010, Carole and Alan, and their daughter Lauren, were casting a wide net over Somerset and Devon. They needed a rural spot to accommodate Lauren's dog training business, as well as a home with the potential to do holiday lets to keep Carole and Alan busy. And in 2019, Ros and Hannah wanted to buy their first home together, but finding somewhere that ticked all of their boxes proved. Now they programme returns to see how both couples are getting on

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hunting enthusiast Hunni Hindley hosts the first party in Lincoln, basing it on a murder-mystery theme and concocting an unconventional menu in the hope of landing the 1,000 prize. There is a heated debate on hunting, and the other guests provide interesting discourse including Ricky Summers-Calvert, who has a revelation to make about his acting career

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Medical supplier Caroline Bevis hosts the second dinner party in Lincoln, hoping her Roaring Twenties-themed evening, including black-bottom Betty torte with beetroot ice-cream, will secure her the 1,000 prize

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Insurance underwriter Glenn Priestly hosts the third dinner party from Lincoln, and hopes his theme of rock music legends will win over his guests. However, the tone of the evening is lowered by student Richard Summers-Calvert's inappropriate questions

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Bodybuilding drama student Richard Summers-Calvert hosts the fourth party of the week from Lincoln. He serves chicken and rice for his starter, main and dessert, but with a few twists, and entertains his guests with a game of charades after asking them to dress up as action heroes

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: All-American mother and former barrister Natashka Ingham hosts the final dinner party from Lincolnshire, and hopes to impress her guests with a theme of The Great American Dream. Her dishes include 'fall off your horse black bottom pie' and 'cow tail pie' and, despite the fact conversation turns to underpants and toilets, she hopes to have done enough to win the 1,000 cash prize

programme.title: Matt Baker's Travels in the Country: USA
programme.desc: Matt travels across the Atlantic to experience rural USA. Starting in Florida, he visits a cattle farmer with a passion for keeping traditions alive by hand cutting sugar cane to boil into syrup, using vintage machinery and discovering the tradition of cowboy poetry. He then travels to the Florida Keys at the southern tip of the state and heads out to help with the largest coral reef restoration effort in the world before exploring the everglades

programme.title: Britain's Most Luxurious Train Journeys
programme.desc: A guide to luxury train rides across Britain, beginning with the steam-hauled Saphos train on the Devonshire coast. Train manager Sandra and her hospitality team help a passenger surprise his wife of 40 years with a special anniversary present, while executive chef Nick creates a sumptuous five-course meal and learner steam train driver Ian clocks up more training hours passing alongside the red rock coast

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Staff and patients at St George's in south west London talk about the importance of family support when dealing with difficult circumstances. Fifty-one-year-old painter and decorator Gary is rushed to St George's after falling 10 feet from a ladder. Cameras also follow five-year-old Beatriz, who has symptoms of a fever. She has a rare kidney condition that affects her immune system, making her vulnerable to infection

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Adrian crashed his bike into a car and may have a serious chest injury requiring emergency surgery, so he makes a heartfelt phone call to his wife Lili - who is 1,400 miles away in Montenegro. Meanwhile, Steve, 49, was encouraged to go to A&E by his wife Julia when his heart rate more than doubled in an hour while preparing supper, and doctors try to determine whether his accelerated heart is connected to his recent stroke and whether he is at risk of having another

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and Katherine Ryan join Sean Lock and Jon Richardson for the words-and-numbers game, while David O'Doherty joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner. Hosted by Jimmy Carr with Rachel Riley looking after the numbers and letters

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Miles Jupp and Sophie Duker join Sean Lock and Jon Richardson for the words-and-numbers game, while Stevenage builders Lee and Dean joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner. Hosted by Jimmy Carr with Rachel Riley looking after the numbers and letters

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Staff and patients at St George's in south west London talk about the importance of family support when dealing with difficult circumstances. Fifty-one-year-old painter and decorator Gary is rushed to St George's after falling 10 feet from a ladder. Cameras also follow five-year-old Beatriz, who has symptoms of a fever. She has a rare kidney condition that affects her immune system, making her vulnerable to infection

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Adrian crashed his bike into a car and may have a serious chest injury requiring emergency surgery, so he makes a heartfelt phone call to his wife Lili - who is 1,400 miles away in Montenegro. Meanwhile, Steve, 49, was encouraged to go to A&E by his wife Julia when his heart rate more than doubled in an hour while preparing supper, and doctors try to determine whether his accelerated heart is connected to his recent stroke and whether he is at risk of having another

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty visits Europe's biggest brewery - Heineken in the Netherlands - on a mission to explain the difference between lager and ale. His journey takes a surprising twist when he comes face to face with the mother of all lagers. Kate Quilton sets Matt Tebbutt the challenge of making crumpets, and finds out how they get filled with unique holes at the Warburtons factory in Enfield, north London. Matt also heads for snowy Canada to discover why maple syrup is so expensive, and finds out that maple syrup robberies are a big concern to the industry

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: Architect George Clarke delves into the world of small builds, meeting people taking tiny, unpromising spaces and creating places to live, work and play. In the first episode of a new series, George meets a couple who are creating a disappearing bathroom and a man squeezing a camper into a Reliant Robin. He also discovers Chile's stunning architecture, and plans his hardest-ever build, an observatory

programme.title: Ugly House to Lovely House with George Clarke
programme.desc: In the second episode, George Clarke is joined by leading architects to help transform a house belonging to Nick and Sonia, an appallingly designed flat spread over three dysfunctional car parking spaces. George charges award-winning architects Abigail Ashton and Andrew Porter with creating something beautiful from this monstrosity. But working with a budget of 75,000, can they transform this foul flat into a proper home with two floors? And what will the pair's neighbours make of the drastic changes?

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: George Clarke sets out to turn a part-Victorian, part-Georgian and part-medieval house in Wales into a modern family home - but the biggest challenge comes when it turns out co-owner Oona does not like kitchens. Can he come up with one that does not follow the standard design? He also meets a couple who have moved into a Victorian house in Hove with an awkwardly shaped extension

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Dog-mad executive PA Julie-Ann Rayner hosts the first dinner party in Southend-on-Sea, Essex, and hopes to impress her guests - science teacher Damian Loneragan, DJ Scott Langley, barmaid Steph Barrett and glamorous granny Carol Dolman - with a 'taste of the sea' menu

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Carol Dolman hosts the second dinner party in Southend-on-Sea, Essex. The glamorous grandmother hopes her scallops and roast lamb, 'dress to impress' theme and tango lessons given by local instructors are enough to win her the 1,000 prize

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Teacher Damian Loneragan hosts the third dinner party in Southend-on-Sea, Essex, where he hopes his chilli-based dishes, and a lemon and ginger dessert, will help him win the 1,000 prize. However, after a disastrous main course, he goes all-out to wow his guests with science experiments in the garden

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Barmaid Steph Barrett is the fourth host of this week's competition in Southend-on-Sea, Essex, and sets a 1940s dress code. The day gets off to a tricky start when she attempts to make home-made pastry for the first time, but her nan saves the day. The guests are suitably impressed by her home, and the dancing entertainment goes down even better than the food

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: DJ Scott Langley hosts the final party in Southend-on-Sea, Essex, and decides to take a gamble by serving fried pigeon as his main course. He insists on an 'outrageous' dress code for the evening, and unveils some special entertainment before the week's winner is announced

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Former pop singer Danny Karne welcomes guests to the Pavilion, his fashion and rock 'n' roll-themed hotel in central London, and the sports car parked outside wows his visitors. But the petrol-head's decision to take his fellow hoteliers to a motoring museum goes down badly when one of them reveals he has no passion for cars

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: John Luce and his partner Pat Sutton invite their fellow hoteliers to the Fox and Duck, a country inn in Therfield, Hertfordshire. The local golf club provides the guests with adequate entertainment, and they appear to bond as they share friendly banter and a spot of singing at the end of the night. However, the following morning brings with it a shower disaster

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Dave and Debbie Lang, who run the New Inn in Newbridge-on-Wye, Powys, play host. Dave is a keen pig breeder and owns the on-site butcher's shop as well as running a pub, so he serves some of his award-winning pork products for breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Kerstin and Robert Sharpe, the owners of Westleigh Farm in Somerset, play host, and despite the initial cobwebs found by some of the guests, they are soon won over by the size of the showers, the quality of the milk and the generous helpings for breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to learn how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers before discovering who has won the week's competition. Old tensions resurface as the results are announced, and there are heated exchanges around the table

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: National Heritage worker Gillian Sutherland hosts the first dinner party in Inverness, and has high hopes that her guests - emergency-call handler Melissa Kirby, property tycoon David Edes, hair stylist Zarina Ainslie and personal fitness trainer Jamie Tulloch - will appreciate her traditional Scottish menu

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Designer-label fan Melissa Kirby hosts the second dinner party in Inverness, hoping her cooking lessons from one of the city's best chefs will win her the 1,000 prize. However, rival Gillian is unimpressed when she finds out the chef also made the gravy

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Property tycoon and teetotaller David Edes hosts a nautical evening for the third dinner party in Inverness, where his menu of 'basic but wholesome food' makes his guests wary. A night of suspicion and hilarity between the diners ensues

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the fourth night of the contest in Inverness, it is hairdresser Zarina Ainslie's turn to host. The fun-loving hopeful needs to live up to her lofty claims of being an amazing cook as her fellow contestants prepare to rate her on the evening

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Former professional footballer Jamie Tulloch hosts the final party in Inverness, going to the trouble of ensuring all the ingredients in his chosen dishes are locally sourced. However, it remains to be seen whether his home-grown approach to fine dining will be enough to impress his discerning fellow competitors, and as the night draws to a close, the week's winner is revealed

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Fifty-year-old motorcyclist Michelle is rushed to A&E after crashing head first into a lamp-post, with scans revealing that she has broken bones in her neck, arm and shoulder and requires emergency surgery. Timothy, 69, arrives at St George's after riding his bicycle into the back of a parked ambulance, while 33-year-old expectant mother Eleanor is admitted after cutting her thumb on a meat cleaver

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics treat a woman who is in excruciating pain after giving birth by caesarean section just over a week ago. Even morphine is having little effect. A mother rings for help after her toddler has been ill for several days and proves difficult to wake, while a woman with a bad cough and a very high temperature is struggling to breathe

programme.title: The Good Doctor
programme.desc: Claire learns to communicate with Shaun as the pair of them race to the hospital with a donated organ. Drama, starring Freddie Highmore and Antonia Thomas

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: The crew of the East Anglian Air Ambulance work the night shift, flying in the dark to help critically injured patients, from the victim of a stabbing needing urgent medical attention to a motorcyclist who has come off his bike and has sustained multiple serious injuries

A mother rings for help after her toddler has been ill for several days and proves difficult to wake, while a woman with a bad cough and a very high temperature is struggling to breathe

Timothy, 69, arrives at St George's after riding his bicycle into the back of a parked ambulance, while 33-year-old expectant mother Eleanor is admitted after cutting her thumb on a meat cleaver

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: The crew of the East Anglian Air Ambulance work the night shift, flying in the dark to help critically injured patients, from the victim of a stabbing needing urgent medical attention to a motorcyclist who has come off his bike and has sustained multiple serious injuries

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: A selection of favourite investigations, including Jimmy Doherty visiting Spain to find out how much orange goes into squash. Matt Tebbutt tries to solve the age-old mystery of how to get ketchup out of the bottle smoothly, while Kate Quilton checks Marmite's TV advert claims that a DNA test can predict whether people are more likely to love it or hate it

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft
programme.desc: Wendi Peters and Ricky Groves go head to head as they take on lint roller printing, while Sharron Davies and Tanni Grey-Thompson have a slogan banner craft-off

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman helps childhood sweethearts Michelle and Fred find their dream holiday home on Gran Canaria. Michelle and Fred fell in love with the island after holidaying there over 20 years ago, and now the time is right to use their 190,000 budget to find somewhere where they can bring Michelle's mother and their three grandsons to enjoy too

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Two Brits decide to move in together in France and start a B&B business, while a Scot tries to follow in his father's footsteps by opening a restaurant in the Costa del Sol

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien search for more items to fix up and sell on, visiting a Norman castle, restoring a Fiat 500 and making a table from part of Southend pier

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

programme.title: Heir Hunters

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The owners of Guest and the City, Dan and Mardi Leonard, welcome their visitors in Brighton, but there is a mixed reaction to the couple's contemporary decor and stained glass windows. The unconventional furniture leaves some guests confused, and one pair of fellow hoteliers bemoan the lack of sausages at breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Entrepreneur Phil Kiernan invites the contestants to the Farmer's Boy Inn in Longhope, Gloucestershire, where he challenges them to a pie-making competition. However, the task proves less entertaining than the bickering that occurs between two guests as they try to share a kitchen

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Alan and Jane Asher host on the Geanna, their purpose-built hotel boat. Dan and Mardi Leonard are concerned space is too tight, while Sarah Langford and Jean-Pierre Kujawa worry about their privacy being invaded. A trip up the Thames allows the guests to sip champagne and get to know the ropes, but the mood at dinner is subdued, and when the owners cook their first breakfast on board they find themselves bickering

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Sarah Langford and Jean-Pierre Kujawa, who have run the Sentry Mead B&B on the Isle of Wight for six years, play host in the last challenge of the week. The guests arrive with high expectations and after a few setbacks, the dinner and breakfast win everyone over

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to learn how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers before discovering who has won the week's competition. Old tensions resurface as the results are announced, and there are heated exchanges around the table

programme.title: Love It or List It Australia
programme.desc: Competitive couple Skye and Jacob are at odds over whether to love or list their 1940s bungalow in Melbourne's Kew East. Skye is on Team List It, dreaming over property pages on a daily basis, while Jacob refuses to move from the place he loves to call home. Andrew Winter tries to shift Jacob out of this house, while Neale Whitaker woos Skye into loving her home once and for all with some fancy cushions

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It

Sarah and her wife Pepper have opposing views on what to do with their two-bedroom terrace, as Sarah thinks it is time to move on, but Pepper is digging her heels in and wants to convert the loft

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Tim and Rebecca battle to get their chateau looking tip top for a tour operator who may potentially want to put it on his books for visitors to the nearby Le Mans motor racing track. Motorcycle-loving couple Martin and Kim continue their rollercoaster search for a dream chateau. The clock is ticking for Fiona as she has 24 hours to prepare for her first ever wedding, and ensure that her 12-acre grounds are picture perfect for the big day. Karen, Paul and their two children need to make their chateau attractive to guests. Their latest plan is to restore a disused hen house, but tensions rise when Paul doesn't meet Karen's standards

The train's staff help out with a surprise wedding proposal and a 90th birthday celebration, while executive chef Nick creates masterpiece meals including a shin of Galloway beef and a trio of mini desserts

programme.title: The Queen's Coronation: Behind Palace Doors
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the conflict between the Queen Mother and Prince Philip over how to administer Princess Elizabeth's coronation in 1953. While the public was presented with an image of the Windsors as a firmly united family, the pair clashed over Philip's desire to introduce the population to a monarchy ready to adapt to modern times. This programme charts the Queen Mother's efforts to protect the royal reputation she helped rebuild after the abdication of Edward VIII

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his great American trek, following his copy of Appleton's General Guide east from Manhattan to Long Island, and visits Brooklyn to hear the story of the construction of the world's first suspension bridge. Below ground, he investigates New York City's inaugural subway, and the dangers faced by the 'sandhogs' who built it. Progressing along the Long Island Railroad to Queens, Michael takes in an ambitious engineering project and a model town built by an Irish immigrant who became one of America's richest men. Later, he heads to the island's Gold Coast, where he relives the fun of 'the roaring twenties' at Oheka Castle, and concludes this leg of his trip at the Montauk lighthouse on Long Island's eastern-most tip

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo follows America's iconic River Hudson, beginning at New York City's Penn Station, where he rides on the national rail carrier service, Amtrak. At Tarrytown, he hears a famous American ghost story, the Legend of Sleepy Hollow, and on the east bank of the Hudson he stops at Garrison, where he hears about the greatest turncoat in American history. In Poughkeepsie, the presenter visits a university built just for women, before arriving in New York's state capital, Albany, where he samples Albany Ale and meets the State Senator

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels across New York state, discovering how General Electric also leads the way in rail technology and examining the story behind George Eastman's Kodak company. He then visits Buffalo and discovers the history behind its grain industry, followed by a trip to witness the awesome power and drama of Niagara Falls

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels through Philadelphia, and pays tribute to its fictional son, Rocky Balboa. He finishes the latest leg of his journey in Gettysburg, the most famous battlefield of the American Civil War, where President Abraham Lincoln made a momentous speech in 1863

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo arrives at a milestone on his American journey as he reaches the boundary between the northern and southern states, known as the Mason-Dixon line. Beginning in Wilmington, North Carolina, he uncovers the history of gunpowder production in Delaware, before heading to Baltimore, where he discovers how the first American steam engine owed a lot to British technology. On the city's east coast, Michael visits the star-shaped Fort McHenry, and learns how the Star-Spangled Banner national anthem was born

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Continuing his trek from Philadelphia to Jamestown, Michael Portillo arrives in the nation's capital, Washington, DC, centre of political power in the world's most powerful country. Steered by his Appleton's Guide of 1879, he admires its fine public buildings, including the largest library in the world, and discovers how the capital was built from scratch after a political compromise between north and south. After this, he travels on to Mount Vernon, exploring a former slave market and visiting an archaeological dig along the way

programme.title: Traffic Cops

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Karl is called to an accident involving a driver in his seventies who has reversed into a house and ruptured a gas main. programme.title: Traffic Cops

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A wealthy man due to marry a younger woman is electrocuted in the bath. Drama, starring Peter Falk, and Martin Landau in a dual role. With Paul Stewart, Julie Newmar and Jeanette Nolan

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A devious lawyer hatches the perfect murder plot - she kills her husband, tells the police he has been kidnapped and leaves the body at the ransom drop, making it look like the criminals who abducted him finished him off. programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: The sleuth's holiday in Mexico is disrupted by a bizarre death involving a suave retired bullfighter, who has killed his best friend using one of the animals as a murder weapon - but is determined his spotless image and reputation will remain untarnished. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Ricardo Montalban, A Martinez and Pedro Armendariz Jr

programme.title: Columbo

Crime drama, directed by and starring Peter Falk. With Patrick O'Neal and Janis Paige

Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.title: Odd Man Out (1947)
programme.desc: An IRA operative stages a robbery to steal funds for his cause, but as he makes his getaway he is wounded by the police and forced to go on the run. Staggering through the backstreets of Belfast, the fugitive encounters a succession of people either willing to help him - or determined to turn him in. Carol Reed's thriller, based on the book by FL Green, with James Mason, Robert Newton and Kathleen Ryan

programme.title: The Devil's Disciple (1959)
programme.desc: The black sheep of a family is befriended by a minister. A case of mistaken identity leads both men to discover their true vocations during the American War of Independence. programme.title: Runaway Railway (1966)
programme.desc: A group of youngsters trying to save a railway line from closure are tricked by crooks planning a robbery. Children's adventure, starring John Moulder-Brown and Kevin Bennett

programme.title: Cranford
programme.desc: The story picks up in August 1844, two years after Miss Matty lost her beloved sister Deborah. Mr Buxton has returned to live quietly in Cranford following the death of his wife, although Miss Matty is concerned about his relationship with his son as neither seem to be coping with their bereavement. The local busybody is also worried about Peggy Bell, who lives in an isolated cottage looking after her inattentive mother and domineering brother, so she hatches a plot to bring these young residents together. However, the surprise arrival of Lady Ludlow's son Lord Septimus leads to a chain of unexpected events concerning the looming railway, and a tragedy at Matty's own house forces her to re-evaluate her opinions on the subject. Judi Dench and Jonathan Pryce star

programme.desc: Leeds United v Liverpool (Kick-off 8.00pm).
